publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-796 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Approval of SE Reports—That the Parliament agrees that the following reports be approved: Special Grant Report on Grant in Aid of Expenditure on Rural Public Passenger Transport for 2000-01 (SE/2000/17) Special Grant Report on Grant in Aid of Expenditure on South Fife to Edinburgh Rail Services for 2000-01 (SE/2000/34).
